name: Almost Gone (itch)
description:
Hey there, peeps from the Interwebs! I am Sinless Hornet and I´m here to bring you my latest (and first) game in early development; Almost Gone. In Almost Gone you take the role of Eleanor, a young adult working for a mailing company. After being asigned with the delivery of a mysterious letter, Eleanor finds herself lost in a weird place full of weird characters, some of which are eager to help Eleanor and some of which are eager to eat her. But that´s adult life, right?
As I said before, right now the game is in early development, and I would REALLY appreciate some love from you. You can test it, and tell me what was your experience. It´s free, after all! I am willing to accept any feedback, as long as it is constructive critique.Game features (as of now):+A colorful cast of characters that may try to charm you!+The alpha for the first chapter of the story+Turn-based combat, wow+Not much else. (Hey, I´m working on it!)
I have to thank to Pencil Arsenal (IG: pencil_arsenal) for helping me with the artwork, and Yanfly for their fantastic plugins.And there you go, I don´t know what else to say. For more development info, you can follow my Instagram account; almost_gone531. I wish you luck out there, fellas!
Sinless out.
